api/index.html.title: Tizen UI Extensions
api/index.html.keywords: Tizen UI Extensions This document is the API Specification for Tizen UI Extensions. Namespace Description Tizen.UIExtensions.Common Provide the common classes that are commonly used on both UI frameworks. Tizen.UIExtensions.ElmSharp Provide the advanced views and containers implemented with ElmSharp. Tizen.UIExtensions.NUI Provide the advanced views and containers implemented with NUI.

api/Tizen.UIExtensions.Common.html.title: Namespace Tizen.UIExtensions.Common
api/Tizen.UIExtensions.Common.html.keywords: Namespace Tizen.UIExtensions.Common Classes BatchableExtensions FormattedString LayoutEventArgs Holds information about size of the area which can be used for layout. Log Provides logging functionality. Span Represent a text with attributes applied. Structs Color Log.Guardian A helper class, it allows to separate optional parameters from non-optional ones. In case of any compilation errors, please make sure you're not using explicit null value as one of the parameters. Point Struct defining a 2-D point as a pair of doubles. Rect Struct defining a rectangle, using doubles. Size Struct defining height and width as a pair of doubles. Interfaces IBatchable IContainable<T> Interface defining methods for managing elements of the container. ILogger IMeasurable Interface of the controls which can measure their size taking into account the available area. ITextable Interface defining properties of formattable text. Enums FontAttributes Enumerates values that describe attributes of text. Keyboard Keyboard layout type on entry control. LineBreakMode Enumerates values that describe options for line braking. PenLineCap PenLineJoin ScrollBarVisibility Enumerates conditions under which scroll bars will be visible. ScrollOrientation Enumeration specifying vertical or horizontal scrolling directions. Stretch TextAlignment Enumerates values that describe alignemnt of text. TextDecorations Flagging enumeration defining text decorations. This enumeration has a FlagsAttribute attribute that allows a bitwise combination of its member values.

api/Tizen.UIExtensions.Common.LineBreakM.title: Enum LineBreakMode
api/Tizen.UIExtensions.Common.LineBreakM.keywords: Enum LineBreakMode Enumerates values that describe options for line braking. Namespace : Tizen.UIExtensions.Common Assembly : Tizen.UIExtensions.ElmSharp.dll Syntax public enum LineBreakMode Fields Name Description CharacterWrap Wrap at character boundaries. HeadTruncation Truncate the head of text. MiddleTruncation Truncate the middle of text. This may be done, for example, by replacing it with an ellipsis. MixedWrap Tries to wrap at word boundaries, and then wrap at a character boundary if the word is too long. None Follow base LineBreakMode. NoWrap Do not wrap text. TailTruncation Truncate the tail of text. WordWrap Wrap at word boundaries.

index.html.title: Tizen UI Extensions
index.html.keywords: Tizen UI Extensions Tizen.UIExtensions provides a set of advanced views and containers based on Tizen.NET UI Frameworks. It includes ElmSharp and NUI implementation sharing Common interfaces and structs. Common Tizen.UIExtensions.Common provides common features like structs and interfaces that are shared on both ElmSharp and NUI UI frameworks. ElmSharp Tizen.UIExtensions.ElmSharp is a set of advanced views and containers based on ElmSharp . NUI Tizen.UIExtensions.NUI is a set of advanced views and containers based on NUI .
